Package org.opengrok.indexer.search

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomQueryParser
    A custom query parser for OpenGrok.
    DefaultQueryEscaper
    This class is a scanner generated by JFlex 1.7.0 from the specification file /home/travis/build/oracle/opengrok/opengrok-indexer/target/jflex-sources/DefaultQueryEscaper.lex
    DirectoryEntry
    Represents a pairing of File along with supplemental FileExtra.
    DirectoryExtraReader
    Represents a searcher to supplement metadata from the file-system with per-file, OpenGrok-analyzed data.
    FileExtra
    Represents supplemental, per-file data stored after OpenGrok analysis.
    FullQueryEscaper
    This class is a scanner generated by JFlex 1.7.0 from the specification file /home/travis/build/oracle/opengrok/opengrok-indexer/target/jflex-sources/FullQueryEscaper.lex
    Hit
    The hit class represents a single search hit.
    PathQueryEscaper
    This class is a scanner generated by JFlex 1.7.0 from the specification file /home/travis/build/oracle/opengrok/opengrok-indexer/target/jflex-sources/PathQueryEscaper.lex
    QueryBuilder
    Helper class that builds a Lucene query based on provided search terms for the different fields.
    Results  
    SearchEngine
    This is an encapsulation of the details on how to search in the index database.
    Summarizer
    Implements hit summarization.
    Summary
    A document summary dynamically generated to match a query.
    Summary.Ellipsis
    An ellipsis fragment within a summary.
    Summary.Fragment
    A fragment of text within a summary.
    Summary.Highlight
    A highlighted fragment of text within a summary.
